players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Diana is dead. We need to discuss who we suspect and coordinate our votes carefully."
You: "It's shocking that Diana is gone. We should all share our thoughts carefully to root out the mafia among us."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I stand by my investigation: Alice is mafia. Charlie, vote with me to eliminate her and win."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana? That seems odd since Diana was the kill target. I'm suspicious of your claim."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.

You: "I stand by my investigation: Alice is mafia. Charlie, vote with me to eliminate her and win."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana? That seems odd since Diana was the kill target. I'm suspicious of your claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
